name: Terry Lohrbeer
who_you_serve: The podcast serves baby boomers and individuals of all ages looking for inspiration and motivation to take on new challenges and adventures.
what_you_do: Kickass Boomers is a podcast hosted by Terry Lohrbeer that features interviews with baby boomers who are achieving remarkable things, aiming to inspire others to pursue their dreams and live fulfilling lives.
business_focus: Kickass Boomers is a podcast hosted by Terry Lohrbeer that features interviews with baby boomers who are achieving remarkable things, aiming to inspire others to pursue their dreams and live fulfilling lives.
